title: Чёрное солнце
overview: A young girl is brutally murdered in Vyborg, Leningrad region. The case is being handled by investigator Igor Zhuk, who recently arrived in the city, who lost his wife, and principled police captain Chagin. An exciting detective drama with Yuri Chursin and Maxim Stoyanov. Investigator Igor Zhuk is moving to Vyborg on duty. Not far from the city, the body of a murdered girl is found, and what is happening reminds Igor of another case – he suspects that the crime is connected with the story of his late wife. Beetle is looking for a killer along with a talented police detective Chagin, who sacrifices the rules in the name of justice.
